veri gud

Дарова лягушата ! Сегодня обзор на портал. Портал вышел 19 апреля 2011 года. Все действия происходят в заброшеной лабаратории которая ещё работала. Как мы знаем Гладос (злодей данной игры) запустила по лабораториям ядовитый газ и все вымерли остался только главный герой чел. Вы просыпаетесь в симуляции и делаете зарядку потом опять ложитесь спать вас разбудил робот уилли от стука в двери.

Portal 2 is an amazing game. I didn't plan on buying it, but saw it was on special with Portal (also a good game), so I figured I'd pick it up. At some points the puzzles rely more on extreme observation than logic, but most of the game is extremely fun. It has quite good graphics, great animation, and a brilliant story, with a twist. Not sure about the full price, but while it's on sail it's definitely worth it.
Awesome game, cool puzzles, would love to see the 3rd Kappa.
Nice^2
up
Plain old puzzle game. Easy to learn, hard to master.

Un juego que es bastante inmersivo y que en ciertos momentos te puede presentar un reto completar, ademas que la historia de este es excelente desde su historia, sus dialogos y su trasfondo, ademas cabe resaltar que tiene una buena rejugabilidad.
The perfect video game got a perfect sequel. 10/10 story, characters, and gameplay.
If you like challenging puzzle platformers this game is for you!

Science? YES! Portal 2 is a good platformer/puzzle game, with Aperture Labs brand testing chambers that will make you say "Why not?" It's clever, witty, and it controls well. The GLaDOS voice is as monotone and uncaring as always, and the cores are just as crazy! Gels, turrets, cameras, CO-OP BOTS! In all, i can say that this game? HUGE SUCCESS. Thank you, Valve. Cave Johnson and Caroline are always with us now. BECAUSE SCIENCE!
Nunca vou me cansar desse jogo.

Play portal game.
Have fun playing portal game.
Beat portal game.
Play through portal game again via time trials.
Beat all portal game time trials.
Make levels in portal game and test your uncreativity, like real man.
Realize portal game level maker not so good.
Get BEE2 mod for portal game.
Make better portal game levels.
Stop playing portal game for a while.
Come back to portal game.
Repeat.
Older, but still very good. 10/10!

Portal 2 is probably one of the most fun coop games i've ever played. With the right partner this game's going to keep you entertained for countless hours. The campaign is alright, but the multiplayer maps made by the community is where the game really shines :)
